projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive web application that visualizes popular sorting and searching algorithms in real-time. Built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for an engaging learning experience.
features: Multiple sorting algorithms (Bubble, Merge, Quick, Heap)
Interactive controls for speed and array size

projects.title: DSA Resume Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack application to track Data Structures and Algorithms practice progress. Features user authentication, progress analytics, and personalized recommendations.

projects.title: HandWritten Digit Recognition
projects.description: A machine learning project that recognizes handwritten digits (0â€“9) using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). Trained on the MNIST dataset, this model classifies images with high accuracy and provides a visual interface to test predictions in real-time. It showcases core concepts in deep learning and computer vision.
features: Trained on MNIST Dataset: 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images of handwritten digits.
CNN Architecture: Uses convolution, pooling, and dense layers to extract features and classify digits.
High Accuracy: Achieves >98% accuracy on test data.
Prediction Interface: Users can upload a digit image or draw one to get instant predictions.
Visualizations: Includes loss/accuracy curves and confusion matrix for performance insights.
